website_summaries.verdict: This pad set is great for beginners since its raised surfaces help remind you where your feet should be placed.
pros: Customize your pads to fit any skimboard
Arch bar measures 20 inches long when the pieces are combined
Will stick to a wooden skimboard
Raised surfaces help you know where your feet should be
cons: No diagram or installation instructions included

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We use this on my sons skimboard and it is a fantastic product. It came in a timely manner and installed fairly simple. Will be buying another set for my skimboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but one of the adhesives came loose.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the product EXCEPT the middle rear traction pad (as that part comes in 3 pieces), came loose after 4 -5 trips to the beach. I have emailed the seller, but no answer as of two days later. Only asking for that replacement piece, as we don't want to remove all of them because it may damage the $200 skimboard. Hopefully the company upholds it's claim to 'guarantee of a lifetime adhesive'. I will report back next week. Here we are 2 weeks later and the seller never responded to me asking about sending a replacement piece. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheech

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these pads 5 Stars are of right now. They seem to be well built and were really easy to put on and seem to be sturdy. The communication with the seller has been excellent and they seem to be one of the most professional company I've done business with in all the years I've been doing business on Amazon. I have yet to take my board into the water so it isn't 'battle tested' just yet but I can leave a follow-up review on that. I highly recommend this product, but I have not been in the water yet but I am pretty confident that these pads will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Price is right, Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Thoroughly cleaned board of wax then wiped down with windex. I let the pad adhesive cure for 24 hrs before first use. Skimming a couple times a week and holding up well. I only wish the rear pad was a bit wider and taller. Ended up buying additional pads for the mid/front section for better traction, allowing less wax needed.
customer_reviews.author: Frankly

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these traction pads twice before and have loved them, but this last time the skimboard I put them on was defective and only lasted 30 mins in the water. I sent the skimboard back, but heard nothing from the skimboard company about getting a refund for the pads. Punt Surf sends a follow-up email after purchase to make sure evrything is good with the product, so I was able to email them back directly about the situation and they immediately refunded me no questions asked! Amazingly helpful. Can’t go wrong with this product, it works great and if it doesnt for some reason, they will make it right.
customer_reviews.author: donovan

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good and feels good under the feet. The pads come in pieces so you need to separately attach them, which can lead to problems lining it up right(at least for me). I had to take them off and reapply to get them right. Then after some use they started to peel off the board from the bottom up. I had to get 3M spay adhesive in order to actually make them stick again so be careful when applying them. Get out a ruler and a pencil and make sure you get them where you want them. Overall decent pads; again a little bit small especially if you're using a bigger skimboard. Good for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pads, very comfortable and they work well for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pads, very comfortable and they work well for a new rider. There are no instructions but installation was just a matter of removing a sticker back and pushing it down. I actually have to attach a vice to one cause the surface of my board didn't immediately adhere but once the adhesive cured it feels solid. Placement on the board is left up to the rider.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply once we watched a YouTube video
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast! Easy to apply once we watched a YouTube video.
customer_reviews.author: Bev - Boca

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this pads
customer_reviews.text: I am a rookie skik boarder. I sanded and applied. Everything stuck great except for the main part of the tail but a little bit of superglue did the job. The material of the pads is great. As a first time user I belive I was inexperienced and that's why I got a little trouble with the tail pad. I left it for 2 days and it is great. I can lift the skimboard holding only the pad. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristiyan Rukov

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works as we expected and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cayle A. Chettinger

customer_reviews.title: Works in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: I normally order from the skim board manufacturer, but they were back ordered, so I ordered these for my newest board. They do the trick, but aren't super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok pads.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son thought the arch bar was kind of fat and after a couple uses the edges are starting to shave off and not as durable as he hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for my son’s skimboard. He easily adhered it to the board with amazing grip. I highly recommend traction pads for boards as it makes it easier to stand and use the board safely. I will be purchasing another set for my other son! Thanks for a great product! Much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great grip. The arch grip and tail grips are slightly raised in the center, which makes it easy to know where your feet are at all times. The tail grip is also raised so your foot doesn't slide off the back
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, I haven't installed it yet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this will work great. I haven't had time to install it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: They don’t stick. Garbage pads
customer_reviews.text: Thought for the price I’d get some sweet traction at a good price. All I have to say is that after applying pads and leaving weights on overnight they still peel off. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Skim Board traction pads.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for learning how to use a skim board. Need to be sure to follow instructions for proper placement.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Followed some YouTube video instructions for how to properly put these on my board and had no issues. Pads work really well and priced at half of what the name brands are is the real draw to these. Will definitely get again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Michigan Mom
customer_reviews.text: I'm no surfer. Or skimmer just a Mom. Ordered this board to replace one I left on the top of the car. It was no longer on the car when we got back. We were on the Michigan West shore. Great skimming off Lake Michigan. The board worked out great. Thanks for helping me redeem my forgetful self.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen P. Heathman

customer_reviews.title: product is great, received quickly using Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: product is great, received quickly using Amazon Prime. Would be great to add some instructions for installation and skim board preparation for installation of the traction pads to the box when shipping. Less knoweagable folks might not understand these techniques and not get optimal performance from you product. Other than that, 5 star product and performance.
customer_reviews.author: John Patrizi

customer_reviews.title: Good pads for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall good material. Good grip. Middle strip corners didn’t have enough adhesion and didn’t stick on completely on one corner.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmom

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Deal
customer_reviews.text: The pad ship extremely fast and it works great. Received the pad on Friday. Rode the skimboard all day Saturday and Sunday. Punt knows their stuff. Quality was great! Especially for the price! NOTE: Make sure to fully apply the pad (press down hard around all edges) my friend lost his back pad on Sunday because he didn't apply it correctly. No fault of the company, just bad application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and still sticking after multiple use
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old, flakey pads with these ones. Install was a breeze, just make sure to clean old adhesive off before applying new. Directions are straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hain

customer_reviews.title: Cant keep them on my board... always ...
customer_reviews.text: Cant keep them on my board... always peel off, no matter what I try. Sanded, cleaned, and re-applied with 3MM spray adhesive still wont keep them on.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Unfortunately my 13 year old son put ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Unfortunately my 13 year old son put it on his board himself and we are having lifting in the back. I can't say that he followed the directions since he was so excited to get it on his board
customer_reviews.author: Driscoll6

customer_reviews.title: Thanx Punt Surf
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and of high quality. Very pleased with Punt Surf. Unfortunatley my son's first skimboard ride was disasterous. Skimboard shot out into heavy surf and we sat on beach and waived bye bye. All and all a great product and have reordered pads. Same case senerio.. New pads have arrived just as Punt Surf said they would. Thanx and I highly recommend these guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply to skim board. Great quality. Item was exactly what was pictured and expected. Great experience.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's Victoria Grommit skim board. Good grips!
customer_reviews.author: Brendy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install and works great. We got lots of riding in already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome track pads
customer_reviews.text: awesome track pads! we're beginner inland skimboarders and ordered these pads based on reviews - they did not disappoint! super easy to apply, looks good, and no one slipped off the board and broke their a**. 3 people have been hittin' the water for a week and their still stuck in place. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will last a long time. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great traction pad! Does what you need it to do and looks great. I like the customizing possibilities with this pad. Just came back from OBX skimming with it, no damage
customer_reviews.author: Raive

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you know how to put these on. Sand and clean your board down. Measure correctly and you should be good. They work great
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit on my skimboard and strong hold! wouldnt order from anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: lindsey letmereviewyouritems wills

customer_reviews.title: Great Traction Pad
customer_reviews.text: This Traction Pad & Arch Bar came very fast once I ordered it and everything in it is in great shape. Overall, it was very easy to get and I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bendo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a gift to rework a used skimboard. Will work great on the victoria skimboard I picked up used.
customer_reviews.author: Butterhead

customer_reviews.title: Half the price, superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. No reason to pay for name brand .
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Rszka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service. Patti Williamson-Richmond
customer_reviews.text: Pads for my sons skim board delivered within days. Excellent service. Patti Williamson-Richmond, VA.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They went on so fast and created ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They went on so fast and created a successful day of skim boarding on the beach!
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: easy install and quick ship
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, easy install and quick ship. Looking forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: Max Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as Astro Deck or any other name brand
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Enjoys it much better with this on
customer_reviews.text: Got for my husbands skim board. Enjoys it much better with this on it
customer_reviews.author: KarlaL27

customer_reviews.title: Can't get a better traction set for twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you need in a full traction set at an unbeatable price. The centerline feels soft on the bottom of your feet and keeps them where they need to be. The center raise on the backpad is perfectly positioned if you want to use the stomp pad or if you would prefer not to. All around outstanding product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keihi12

customer_reviews.title: Skim
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased and it looks great on his board!
customer_reviews.author: Linds2113

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pad, really gives me a lot of control over my board.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Vendor, very fast delivery. Exactly as advertised. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my son and he is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: so far the adhesive on the pad has stayed stronger ...
customer_reviews.text: so far the adhesive on the pad has stayed stronger than any other pad I've ordered off amazon, which in my opinion is the most important aspect of traction pads. no peeling even after 10 solid sessions.. would order again... probably will
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my son who recently purchased his first skimboard his review is, they are easy to apply and traction is great. He would recommend them and feels they are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast and I stuck them to my new board as soon as they came in. The real test will come soon enough when I get out on the waves with my skimboard! Great price for great quality. :)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Got them Wednesday night. Used the skim board on Thursday. Worked great! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Keegan  Paez so    cool

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing and came in within 2 days. I didn't get a chance to use them yet but I placed them on my board easily with no problems really happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Joshua michael sosa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Pads can be separated for greater coverage. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Near

customer_reviews.title: looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: Used the arch pad sections with a Punt Surf large stomper pad for a wide(16.5 inch) tail sup board. looks great and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality traction pad and arch bar for a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality traction pad and arch bar for a great price. Put mine on a few weeks ago and I absolutely love it! Quality product from a company with quality customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gerver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, haven't tested it out yet but will this weekend. Stoked!
customer_reviews.author: bookworm500

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to apply, if you are not sure how, there are plenty of YouTube videos. I have not had any issues of it peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: John Cooke

customer_reviews.title: great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and was exactly as shown. Great price! Would order from punt surf anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S

customer_reviews.title: works great! does not come with instructions to apply to ...
customer_reviews.text: works great! does not come with instructions to apply to skimboard but plenty of youtube videos show you how. sticks well, good traction, much cheaper than other products. can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: Deon Wolpowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a minor problem but it was fixed right away. Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great traction pads. My 12 year applied them easily and he really likes them and they work awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pad and great price. You can't beat the quality on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality. I've ordered at least 4 sets now for different boards and they all stand up to some beatings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's only natural to have installing instructions with any product. Here is none.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: stays on so far. Cons: a big one: would be nice to have installing instructions! We found one on Youtube, but the pads were of a different shape, so it took a bit of time to figure out. I am adding a star for a nice response from punt surf team. Thank you! Still, as complete newbies to skimboarding, we think installing instructions is a must to include.
customer_reviews.author: Konatka

customer_reviews.title: Great traction pads!
customer_reviews.text: These traction pads are very simple but good if you are a beginner skim boarder. The one problem I had with it was the traction pads did not come with instructions. I had no idea how to put them on! So I went on the internet and found a video. I would give it five stars if it came with instructions. A simple instruction sheet would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Allison L. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful board
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super fast shipping. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered at a great price and it came on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pads! They do the job well and they look great
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: As good as the top brands for way less money!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product especially for the price. Good traction, great for tricks, and even better at staying on the board! Will definitely buy again. The only thing I would comment on is that the rail is a tad wide and squared off on the end which looked cheap but it was super easy to make it just right with a pair of scissors! Great job PUNT!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bernal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stuck good for a couple months, and now my pads have lost their stick and they fell off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripper Skimboard Traction.
customer_reviews.text: AAAAH, went directly into garbage can after I ripped them off my skimboard. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been appreciated if instructions or a diagram were included on where to place on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to install, and was great in the warm gulf waters.
customer_reviews.author: christian neal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We added this to our skim board...very cool..great traction and adds great balance.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Yaniero

product_meta.title: PUNT SURF Skimboard Traction Pad with Arch Bar Set - 5 Piece Skim Board Stomp Foot Pads - Maximum Kick Tail Deck Grip EVA Foam 3M Adhesive for Skimboarding - Sticks Forever on Your Board
feature_bullets: SEE THEIR JAWS DROP: Our traction pad provides the ULTIMATE, LIGHTWEIGHT grip for you. Dig your back foot in with confidence on those critical bottom turns and cutbacks.

CUSTOMIZABLE, FITS ANY SKIMBOARD: You can place this 5 piece pad as you please. Spread the pieces out for wider boards, put the pieces together for narrower ones. Tail Pad Dimensions: 10.5" x 11.75", 10mm center arch, 25mm tail kick. Arch Bar Dimensions: 20" long (two pieces combined) x 3.25" wide, 10mm continuous raised arch.
UNBEATABLE QUALITY: We only use premium 3M adhesive direct from the source and marine-grade, ultralight diamond grooved EVA foam.

PUNT SURF 100% STOKE GUARANTEE: Our traction pads will stick forever on your board or your money back, no questions asked. We're a homegrown company from California, and our mission is to provide premium surf, skim and SUP accessories for all. We love being in the water, and we're always testing our products to ensure they are the best out there. We're confident you'll be stoked!

LOVE OUR PLANET, CHOOSE PUNT SURF: For us, making premium products for all isn't enough. We are a highly environmentally conscious company that cares about giving back. As a proud member of 1% for the Planet, we donate a portion of every sale to nonprofits dedicated to protecting our oceans and environment.
